description.value:
Frequency once per day

You channel your spirit into a mighty barrage from a celestial plasma cannon. Iomedae's barrage Auto-Fires in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] or a @Template[type:line|distance:30], dealing @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2 - 1))d6[fire], (floor(@actor.level/2 - 1))d6[spirit]|traits:holy] damage with the holy trait (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)]). At 12th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the fire and spirit damage each increase by 1d6. A creature that gets a critical failure on this Reflex save is also @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Blinded] for 1 round.
